statements: SELECT * FROM costume_inventory;
SELECT costume_name, size, color FROM costume_inventory;
SELECT costume_id, quantity FROM costume_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM costume_inventory ORDER BY last_alteration_date DESC;
SELECT costume_name, color FROM costume_inventory WHERE size = 'M';
SELECT * FROM costume_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY costume_name DESC;
SELECT costume_name, color, quantity FROM costume_inventory WHERE size='small' AND ordered_by='John Smith';
SELECT costume_name, color FROM costume_inventory WHERE size='medium' AND last_alteration_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT costume_name, quantity FROM costume_inventory WHERE color='blue' ORDER BY last_alteration_date ASC;
SELECT costume_name, size, color, quantity, ordered_by FROM costume_inventory WHERE ordered_by IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY ordered_by DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM DanceCostumeInventory;
SELECT costume_name, color FROM DanceCostumeInventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT costume_name, size, color FROM DanceCostumeInventory ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT * FROM Alterations WHERE alteration_type = 'hemming';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_cost FROM Orders WHERE total_cost > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM DanceCostumeInventory ORDER BY costume_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT costume_name, size FROM DanceCostumeInventory WHERE color='Red'
SELECT * FROM DanceCostumeInventory WHERE size='M' AND color='Blue'
SELECT costume_name, quantity FROM DanceCostumeInventory WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT o.order_id, o.customer_name, oi.costume_name FROM Orders o JOIN OrderItems oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
SELECT * FROM dance_costumes;
SELECT costume_name, color FROM dance_costumes WHERE size='M';
SELECT costume_name, quantity FROM dance_costumes ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM alterations WHERE date_requested >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, delivery_date FROM orders WHERE delivery_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM dance_costumes WHERE size = 'S';
SELECT costume_name, color, quantity FROM dance_costumes ORDER BY costume_name DESC;
SELECT costume_id, size, color FROM dance_costumes WHERE quantity > 10 AND color = 'Red';
SELECT * FROM alterations WHERE date_requested > '2022-01-01' AND date_completed IS NOT NULL;
SELECT costume_name, customer_name, order_date FROM dance_costumes JOIN orders ON dance_costumes.costume_id = orders.costume_id WHERE orders.delivery_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM costumes WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT costume_name, costume_type FROM costumes WHERE costume_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM alterations ORDER BY alteration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM costume_orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY costume_id ASC;
SELECT costume_name, quantity FROM costumes WHERE costume_type = 'Superhero' AND quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM costumes WHERE costume_type='Superhero' ORDER BY costume_name DESC;
SELECT costume_name, quantity FROM costumes WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT costume_name, alteration_date FROM costumes c INNER JOIN alterations a ON c.costume_id = a.costume_id WHERE a.alteration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, delivery_address FROM orders o INNER JOIN costume_orders co ON o.order_id = co.order_id GROUP BY o.customer_name;
SELECT c.costume_name, SUM(co.quantity) AS total_ordered FROM costumes c INNER JOIN costume_orders co ON c.costume_id = co.costume_id GROUP BY c.costume_name ORDER BY total_ordered DESC;
SELECT * FROM DanceCostumes;
SELECT costume_name, costume_type FROM DanceCostumes WHERE costume_color = 'Red';
SELECT costume_id, costume_color, costume_size FROM DanceCostumes ORDER BY costume_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT costume_name, costume_type, costume_color FROM DanceCostumes WHERE costume_type = 'Ballet' AND costume_color = 'Pink';
SELECT * FROM DanceCostumes WHERE costume_id = 1;
SELECT costume_name, costume_type FROM DanceCostumes WHERE costume_color = 'Red';
SELECT costume_id, costume_type, costume_size FROM DanceCostumes WHERE costume_type IN ('Ballet', 'Jazz') ORDER BY costume_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders o JOIN OrderItems oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE o.order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND o.order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT i.inventory_id, i.quantity, i.location, c.costume_name FROM Inventory i JOIN DanceCostumes c ON i.costume_id = c.costume_id WHERE i.quantity > 10 ORDER BY i.last_updated ASC;
